root: ^Ripley has been giving the security team members their company-mandated physicals. It seems that one crew member has been avoiding his appointments. "This is the third time I have scheduled an appointment with him, but he keeps coming up with excuses for his absences. I recommend removing him from security detail until he finally comes in for a checkup."

Remove: ^You have the truant removed from his role, telling him he will only get his position back when he finally gets his physical. Eventually he agrees to it. Ripley reports back. "It seems he has a heart condition that prevents eligibility for a role on the security team. Worse, it turns out he would likely have had a heart attack any day now. I've got him on some medicine to prevent that, but he still needs to be removed from the security team."
Keep: ^You need all the protection you can get, so you decline having the truant removed from his position. Unfortunately, the reason for his skipping his appointment becomes clear very soon. While trying to break up a squabble during lunch, he suddenly clutched his chest and fell to the floor. Dead.

^The autopsy reveals a heart condition that would have necessitated his removal from the security team but could have been treated with medicine. It seems he knew of his condition, but not the severity of it.
